item.title: Christina add a quote by Antonin Artaud
item.description: "For nothing bestializes a being like the taste for eternal happiness, the search for eternal happiness at any price, and mademoiselle Lucifer is that slut who never wanted to abandon eternal happiness." -- Antonin Artaud

item.title: Christina add a quote by Antonin Artaud
item.description: "There is in every madman a misunderstood genius whose idea shining in his head frightened people and for whom delirium was the only solution to the strangulation that life had prepared for him." -- Antonin Artaud

item.title: Christina add a quote by Antonin Artaud
item.description: "I call for actors burning at the stakes, laughing at the flames." -- Antonin Artaud

item.title: Christina add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Christina add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Christina add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "People living deeply have no fear of death." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Christina add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "The role of a writer is not to say what we can all say, but what we are unable to say." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Christina add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Christina add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Live to the point of tears." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Christina add a quote by Antonin Artaud
item.description: "I would like to write a Book which would drive men mad, which would be like an open door leading them where they would never have consented to go, in short, a door that opens onto reality." -- Antonin Artaud

item.title: Christina add a quote by Antonin Artaud
item.description: "I abandon myself to the fever of dreams, in search for new laws." -- Antonin Artaud
